name: vscode-translator
description: Translate code within VSCode to a language of your choice
author: hngr18

translation.input.description: The language of the variables and comments in the source code you would like to translate

translation.output.description: The language you would like to translate to

translation.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
